description: It took more than 30 years for Larry Kramer’s play “The Normal Heart,” about gay New Yorkers struggling with AIDS, to be turned into a movie. But for the playwright, there is still work to be done.
title: Larry Kramer: The Fighting Heart
title_page: Larry Kramer: The Fighting Heart - Video - NYTimes.com
text: It took more than 30 years for Larry Kramer’s play “The Normal Heart,” about gay New Yorkers struggling with AIDS, to be turned into a movie. But for the playwright, there is still work to be done.
